document_data.name: Brysis
document_data.mainbody: '''Brysis of Khaem''' was a [[wraith]] [[sorcerer]] in the [[Lost Tomb of Khaem]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In life, Brysis was a great sorcerer in [[Netheril]]. On the day of her death, she was interred in a floating tomb.

After the fall of Netheril, Brysis's tomb plummeted into a crevasse and wound up in the [[Underdark]] region of the Silken Paths, where it remained for centuries.

Magical energies awoke Brysis from the eternal sleep of death as a wraith, served by [[specter]]s who were once her loyal retainers. 

A party of adventurers escaping [[drow]] slavers of [[Velkynvelve]] with help of [[Fargas Rumblefoot]] may have defeated her.
